author: cnbc.com
title: Curtiss-Wright Declares Dividend of $0.15 Per Share for Common Stock
text:
CHARLOTTE, N.C.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Curtiss-Wright Corporation (NYSE: CW) today announced that the Board of Directors declared a dividend of fifteen cents ($0.15) per share on Curtiss-Wright Common Stock, payable April 12, 2018 to stockholders of record March 29, 2018.
About Curtiss-Wright Corporation
Curtiss-Wright Corporation (NYSE:CW) is a global innovative company that delivers highly engineered, critical function products and services to the commercial, industrial, defense and energy markets. Building on the heritage of Glenn Curtiss and the Wright brothers, Curtiss-Wright has a long tradition of providing reliable solutions through trusted customer relationships. The company employs approximately 8,600 people worldwide. visit www.curtisswright.com .
